pr_title: [typescript] Append enum suffix without model suffix

timeline.body:
This is a mapping for the OAS2 built-in `file` type. It's similar to the existing mapping defined in `TypeScriptAngularClientCodegen.java`:
```
typeMapping.put("file", "Blob");
```
Without that, the updated `toModelName()` logic would add a bogus import for api endpoints that deal with type:file (`imageUpload` endpoint in PetStore)

Frankly, I'm not sure if the old mapping in line 151 here is needed at all.

timeline.bodyHTML:
This is a mapping for the OAS2 built-in file type. It's similar to the existing mapping defined in TypeScriptAngularClientCodegen.java:

typeMapping.put("file", "Blob");

Without that, the updated toModelName() logic would add a bogus import for api endpoints that deal with type:file (imageUpload endpoint in PetStore)

Frankly, I'm not sure if the old mapping in line 151 here is needed at all.
timeline.author: amakhrov

timeline.message: [typescript] Generate enum name independently on model name, ignoring modelSuffix
Add `enumSufix` cli option for all typescript generators
Add a typeMapping for OAS2 built-in "file" type
Update TypeScriptFetchModelTest - make sure codegen options are processed before running assertions

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into typescript-angular-enum-suffix
